Name: Matcha Gotcha
Effect: Single Target. Projectile Move. Low Accuracy 1. The User restores Hp equal to half the damage dealt, founded down. Roll 2 Chancce Dice to inflict 1st Degree BUrn on the Target. If the user is Frozen solid, destroy the ice bloc.
Description: The user invites the foe to a hebal tea ceremony. As the tea is served and the foe is off guard, the user throws the hot tea on them, then proceeds to enjoy their own cup.
